titles.title: To authorize appropriations for the Department of Veterans Affairs for construction and maintenance, and for other purposes.
To authorize appropriations for the Department of Veterans Affairs for construction and maintenance, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: This bill authorizes appropriations for the Department of Veterans Affairs for construction projects, nonrecurring maintenance, and grants for the acquisition and operation of state home facilities for furnishing domiciliary, nursing home, and hospital care.
